title: Distributed Deep Learning Inference Optimization Design in IoT Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Basic deep learning concepts, IoT system understanding, and introductory programming knowledge
context.additional_context: Focus on acquiring optimization techniques applicable to real-world tasks within limited timeframes for working professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain key constraints of distributed deep learning inference in IoT environments (bandwidth, latency, security)
Establishing a design process for efficiently distributing DNN inference tasks across IoT devices using reinforcement learning-based optimization techniques
Implementing project-based model partitioning and inference scheduling methods that prioritize privacy protection

resources: Reinforcement Learning Simulation Tool (Cloud-Based, e.g., Colab Lite)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
